description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A game of skill, accuracy and guts!  Pilot your ship from moon to moon while avoiding the asteroids.  Score points by landing on moons and clearing the limitless levels.  Your only offense is your deft maneuvering, while your defense is the shields you earn by scoring points.
description.short: A game of skill, accuracy and guts!  Pilot your ship from moon to moon while avoiding the asteroids.  Score points by landing on moons and clearing the limitless levels.  Your only offense is your deft maneuvering, while your defense is the shields you earn by scoring points.
